Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
11.09.2014 SH SCR19134 Test140/150: Added test on already booked invoice (no MC)
22.04.2014 SH SCR18789 Test 400: Removed changes (Replaced GNRL_MARKCODMAXCOMMEXCEEDED by GNRL_MARKCODLIMEXCEEDED at all places)
26.03.2014 SH SCR18789 Test 500: Changed update PO.MARKCODESA (was GNRL_MARKCODLIMEXCEEDED) and
added calc of V.INVESTMENTMARGINCLIENTH (based on new field CDTI_MAXFINANCECLIENT); Test 400 Replaced
GNRL_MARKCODLIMEXCEEDED by GNRL_MARKCODMAXCOMMEXCEEDED at all places
19.02.2014 SH SCR18729 Test 500: Changed test max(CDTI_MAXFINANCETOTAL) into sum(CDTI_MAXFINANCETOTAL) and
added test sum(CDTI_MAXFINANCETOTAL) > 0 to perform test 500
16.01.2014 SH SCR18623 Removed Test 50
16.01.2014 SH SCR18648 Added Test 83 Debit notes invoice buying while debtor balance < 0
13.01.2014 SH SCR18623 Test 50: In case of SCF, program jumps now directly to step 999
29.07.2013 SH SCR18306/18311 Test 87: Added test on INVO_PAYMENTCODE = 0 and existing DBHS
03.07.2013 SH SCR18249 Test 82: Extended update PO.MARKCODESA with GSBU_MARKCODE (2066) if > 0
03.07.2013 SH SCR18248 Test 500: Changed logic (increasing performance)
03.06.2013 SH SCR18164 Added step 87 'Cash on delivery'
29.04.2013 GB SCR18117 Extended test for the 80 Markcode at debtor level
16.04.2013 SH SCR18069 Test 500: Changed updates of V.INVESTMENTMARGINC and PO.AMOUNTSA
15.04.2013 SH SCR18078 Test 500: Added calculation of v.FACTACCSCTC, used for update v.INVESTMENTMARGINC
21.02.2013 SH SCR17949 Added logging information (input/output parameter), written if GSET_YESNO(370)='Y';
Added PIO.BDC151.PO.xxxx parameters
15.02.2013 SH SCR17949 Added PO.ADDITIONALFINANCEH incl. update in step 400
23.01.2013 SH SCR17884 Test160/170: Replaced test < date() by < INVO_BOOKINGDATE; Test 82: Extended test to
book credit amount in the special account
09.07.2012 SH SCR17399 Test 10: Replaced test SCHT_AUTOMATIC = Y by SCHT_STORNO_FROM_SCHT_NO > 0
03.05.2012 SH SCR17298 Test500: Fixed bug in "DSQL_Calc_v.FACTACCACC" was defined as Yes/After instead No/Before
to calculate amounts for multiple clients
22.03.2012 SH SCR17215 Test 500 : Removed test PI.SCHT_NO > 0 that the invoice cannot be financed
05.12.2011 SH SCR16880 Added GB114.PI.INVO_INVDATE = INVO_INVDATE; Added step 82, 500 and
extended step 400
23.06.2011 GB SCR16552 Changed calculation for the V.EXCCONCENTRATIONC
(410 Concentration)
07.05.2011 GB SCR16396 Replaced GNRL_MARKCODMAXDAYSNEWINV by
GSBU_MARKCODE (2007)
13.04.2011 SH SCR16381 Test 140 Fixed problem with 0 investment
30.03.2011 SH SCR16332 Test 140 added test on DEBC_MAXINVAMOUNT
23.03.2011 JOH SCR16306 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and
GB002 by GB902
18.01.2011 SH SCR16151 Test110/420/430 Removed test
CLNT614_INTERESTUPFRONT = Y (added test CLUP_FINANCEINMATDATE = Y)
09.11.2010 SH SCR15966 Added BDC144.PI.CALLINGPROGRAM = blank
13.08.2010 SH SCR15718 Test410 Changed update of V.EXCCONCENTRATIONC if
PO.TESTCONCENTRATION = Y
04.08.2010 SH SCR15693 Added new test "5. Supply chain finance"
14.04.2010 SH SCR15330 Test150 Fixed bug to perform parameter updates
09.02.2010 SH SCR15319 Test 140/150 Removed test GNRL_CODE = PL to check DBHS
03.02.2010 SH SCR15306 Test 140/150 Added test on DBHS to skip the updates, if
the markcode was already removed in the past
27.11.2009 SH SCR15095 Test 85 Pre-Invoicing: Added test
"CLNT410_PREINVOICING = 1 or 2"
19.11.2009 SH SCR15078 Test 140 Added test and (INVO_MARKCODETEXT = 0
or INVO_MARKCODETEXT <> GSET_MARKCODE (314))
13.11.2009 SH SCR15053 "15. Dummy debtor" --> Added test PI.SCHT_NO > 0;
Undo changes SCR15025 and added new step 999 "Check markcode"
09.11.2009 SH SCR15025 Step450 : Set PO.MARKCODESA =GNRL_MARKCODLIMEXCEEDED
if SCHI_MARKCODE = 0 and PO.AMOUNTSA > 0
02.11.2009 SH SCR15009 Added new step "85 Pre-invoicing"
02.11.2009 SH SCR14961 Step 400: Added substraction with INVA_ACTAFACTORING
if the invoice can be partly financed or not financed
07.10.2009 GB SCR14976 Extended condition for 170 Maximum days new invoices ...
and 190 Maximum payment days client level
28.08.2009 SH SCR14832 Added PI.LEVEL and PO.NIHIL_CREDITLIMIT
03.08.2009 SH SCR14775 Added test 15. Dummy debtor
-- DO NOT RESET --> PIO.BDC151.PO.xxx parameter (only passed through)
-- Logging information
-- 5. Supply chain finance
-- 10. Automatic storno via OSP004B1 (use details from original schedule)
-- 15. Dummy debtor
-- 20. Manual confidential adjustment with markcode
-- 30. Manual confidential adjustment without markcode
-- 40. Markcode already supplied in new schedule
-- 60. Delcredere clients
-- 70. Miscellaneous debtors confidential clients
-- 80. Markcode at debtor level
-- 82 Credit notes invoice buying
-- 83 Debit notes invoice buying while debtor balance < 0
-- 85 Pre-invoicing
-- 87 Cash on delivery
... check if markcode was already removed in the past, then skip the updates
-- 90. WKA credit notes
-- 100. Deduct credit note from overdue invoices
-- 110. Test if correction invoices maturity factoring can be compensated
-- 120. Credit note always factoring account
-- 130. Already invoices with markcode other old invoices
-- 140. Maximum invoice amount exceeded
-- 150. Maximum invoice amount exceeded (via percentage)
-- 160. Maximum days new invoices (only in new schedule) debtor level
-- 170. Maximum days new invoices (only in new schedule) client level
-- 180. Maximum payment days debtor level
-- 190. Maximum payment days client level
-- 200. Invoice overdue
-- 400. Check allowed finance against limit
-- The remaining tests must be always performed, independently from
v.ContiuneTests (only used in previous parts to avoid an unreadable
Block If ... Block Else ... Block End construction)
-- 410. Concentration
-- 420. Maturity factoring existing invoices
-- 430. Maturity factoring new invoices
-- 440. At least the WKA must be on special account
-- 450. Replacement schedule
-- 500 Additional invoice buying tests (test on sum(CDTI_MAXFINANCETOTAL) >0 is implemented in subtask)
-- 999. Check markcode
-- Logging information
... check if markcode was already removed in the past, then skip the updates
... check if invoice is already booked, no MC was set
... check if markcode was already removed in the past, then skip the updates
... check if invoice is already booked, no MC was set
-- Calculate additional finance
... already sent to BDC160 as input parameter, so skip BDC151
-- Reset BDC151 output parameters (only if BDC151 is called, should be untouched if BDC160 is called without
calling BDC151, triggered in BSP001A02 to speed up schedule handling)
-- Set v.P1
-- The whole invoice can be financed
... else the invoice can be partly financed or not financed
-- Invoice cannot be bought, because ...
... only allowed for the whole amount
... due date already reached
-- Whole credit note can be booked on Factoring account
... only a part of the credit note can be booked on Factoring account
... else the whole credit amount must be booked in the special account

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DEBB join :1/CLNT on CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :3 join :1/DEBH on :4 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where DEBB_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO for fetch only

Text.val: -- Invoice cannot be financed
-- Invoice can be partly financed

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CDTI_MAXFINANCETOTAL) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CDTI_CURRBALFACTACC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CDTI_CURRBALRETENTIONACC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CDTI_CURRBALGUARANTEES) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CDTI where CDTI_COMM_ADMNO = :2 and CDTI_COMM_CLNTNO = :3 and CDTI_HOFF_CODE = ':4' for fetch only
